title: Computer-Based Tutoring System Design for Cultivating Object-Oriented Programming Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Programming Concepts (e.g., C/Java) and Software Development Experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening Practical Competencies for Pre-Service/Educators to Apply Object-Oriented Design Principles in Real-World Educational Settings

learning_goals: Learners can model complex systems object-orientedly using UML diagrams
Learners can develop maintainable software through coding practice applying SOLID principles
Learners can improve their object-oriented design patterns by analyzing feedback provided by computer-based tutoring systems
Learners can compare various object-oriented architectures and select optimal solutions through peer assessment in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
